orderPollingWindowMinutes.description: Controls how far back to request orders when no pagination cursor is available. Increase to capture more historical orders; decrease to limit queries to recent activity.

pollIntervalMs.description: Delay between successive polling requests for orders. Lower this value for faster updates at the cost of additional network load; raise it to reduce traffic.

pollLimit.description: Maximum number of orders requested per poll. Increase to fetch more orders at once; decrease to shrink payload sizes.

driftBufferMs.description: Amount of time subtracted from the latest cursor to account for clock drift. Increase to guard against missed orders; decrease to minimize duplicate retrievals.

staleActiveRetentionMs.description: Retention window for active orders kept in memory before pruning. Increase to keep orders visible longer; decrease to reclaim memory sooner.

staleReadyRetentionMs.description: Retention window for ready orders before they are pruned. Increase to keep fulfilled orders available longer; decrease to clear them out more quickly.

targetedFetchConcurrency.description: Number of targeted fetch requests that may run in parallel. Increase to fan out more aggressively; decrease to limit concurrent load.

targetedFetchMaxRetries.description: Maximum retry attempts for targeted fetches when they fail. Increase to make the system more persistent; decrease to fail faster.

targetedFetchBackoffMs.description: Delay applied between targeted fetch retry attempts. Increase for a gentler retry cadence; decrease to retry more rapidly.

ordersEndpoint.description: Worker endpoint used for fetching orders. Point this to a different worker origin to change the orders source.

menusEndpoint.description: Worker endpoint used for fetching menu data. Update this if the menus API location changes.

configSnapshotEndpoint.description: Worker endpoint used for fetching configuration snapshots. Modify this when the configuration API location changes.
